*R/canva_upload.R*

## canva_upload

## Description
 Set up function for uploading graphs to canva.com 


## Usage
```r
 
canva_upload( 
  plot_object, 
  plot_width, 
  plot_height, 
  plot_units, 
  plot_title, 
  file_name = NULL, 
  file_format, 
  transparent_bg, 
  canva_secret_key = Sys.getenv("CANVIZ_SECRET_KEY") 
) 
```

## Arguments
|Arguments|Description|
|---|---|
| plot_object | Plot object |
| plot_width | Plot width |
| plot_height | Plot height |
| plot_units | Plot units - 'mm', 'cm', 'in', 'px' |
| plot_title | Plot title and image title in Canva uploads |
| file_name | Save graph to specified file name - this is only needed if you want to write over copies of the same graph. |
| file_format | Saved file format - "html", "png", "svg", "jpeg" |
| transparent_bg | Save with a transparent background. Boolean (True/False). |
| canva_secret_key | API key - grab from the canviz content app on canva.com |
